translations.translation: so that what enveloped it enveloped it.
So that they were covered over by what they were covered over.
and caused them to be covered with that which He covered them with.
So they were covered with whatever covered them?
So, there covered them that which did cover.
So there covered them that which covered.
so that there covered it that which covered.
So that there covered them that which did cover.
and then covered them from sight forever.
Then covered them with that which covered them.
covering it with what covered it.
So that (ruins unknown) have covered them up.
So there covered them that which did cover (i.e. torment with stones).
so that there came upon them that which came.
And covered them with whatever covered them.
And covered them by that which He covered.

[53:54] so that there covered them, of rocks afterwards, that which covered [them]: this is [purposely] left vague in order to inspire terror; in [sūrat] Hūd [it is stated]: We made their uppermost the nethermost, and We rained upon them stones of baked clay [Q. 11:82].
(So that there covered them that which did cover) i.e. stones covered them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَغَشَّاهَا } حينئذ { مَا غَشَّىٰ } [النجم: 54] من أمطار الحجارة
 وأنواع المصيبات والعاهات
 والنكبات


وبالجملة: { فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكَ } وأصناف نعمائه المتوالية المترادفة من انتقام الأعداء وإنعام الأولياء { تَتَمَارَىٰ } [النجم: 55] وتتدافع على وجه الجدال والمراء
 أيها المحجوب الجاحد لوحدة الحق واستقلاله في عموم تصرفاته الجارية في ملكه وملكوته
 بكمال الإرادة والاختيار
